TRAILERS

by
June 2, 2025
Source: YouTube

"If this works, Satoshi, nothing will be the same." And it did work and now we're here. Anarchy Pictures has revealed an official trailer for Satoshi: The Movie, a new Bitcoin-inspired movie about the creation of the (in)famous cryptocurrency and its anonymous Japanese inventor Satoshi Nakamoto. Yes this is so cheesy because it's meant to be a first look teaser & pitch video for this movie which is pretty much made by Bitcoin fans for Bitcoin fans. "Freedom comes with a price" is the tagline which is a standard way of claiming that cryptocurrency is "free" from all government currency. Whatever. Satoshi is a scripted mystery-thriller from Anarchy Pictures exploring Bitcoinâ€™s untold origin â€” not through speculation, but through story. Starring Casper Van Dien as Hal Finney, and Peter Shinkoda as Satoshi Nakamoto, directed by indie filmmaker Shaun Piccinino. "Satoshi reframes the question from who is Satoshi to why was Bitcoin born â€” honoring the freedom-first ethos at its core." Okay sure but this doesn't look like it's going to be a very exciting movie. Pretty dull footage so far. Stay tuned for more updates as this isn't expected to debut until 2026 anyway. ðŸ¤‘

Here's the first teaser trailer (+ poster) for Shaun Piccinino's Satoshi: The Movie, direct from YouTube:

"Freedom comes with a price." When Hal and pseudonymous Satoshi's collaboration births Bitcoin, an unstoppable idea is etched in code. On another time chain as Hal is cryo-preserved, another pact rewrites everything. Satoshi is for anyone that values freedom, not just Bitcoiners. exploring: online friendships, human ingenuity, perseverance, resistance vs. oppressive regimes, the power of unstoppable ideas etched in code. Satoshi: The Movie is directed by stunt coordinator / filmmaker Shaun Paul Piccinino, director of many films including The Bloodletting, The Lackey, American Fighter, Roped, Lady Driver, Wheels of Fortune, A California Christmas, That's Amor, Holiday Harmony, and The Island (2023) previously. The screenplay is written by Sky Conway and Shaun Paul Piccinino. Produced by Sky Conway. Made by Anarchy Pictures. Piccinino's Satoshi: The Movie is expected to debut to watch (via VOD) starting on January 3rd, 2026 early next year. They'll also launch crowdfunding soon, too. For more info, visit the film's official site.
